metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9657 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The tt_face_load_hdmx function in truetype/ttpload.c in FreeType before2.5.4 does not establish a minimum record size, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via a crafted TrueType font.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9657` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4').
